roupas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q11460 wd:Q198763 wd:Q17152912 wd:Q1146363 wd:Q212989 wd:Q22676 wd:Q161928} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

bonecas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q168658 wd:Q44201312} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

brinquedos.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q11422 wd:Q11410 wd:Q22937791} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

materiais.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q2383811 wd:Q3300034 wd:Q39546 wd:Q2041172 wd:Q43013} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

miscelânea.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P31 ?instancia; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q125191} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q3305213} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q162827} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q18965}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11034}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q192425}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1572315}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q4006}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11060274}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q216526}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q2668072} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q93184} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q8011558} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q49848} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q23013246} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q488053} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1261026} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q595597} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q18573970} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1156791} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1155772} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1027879} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q193955} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11460} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q198763} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q17152912 } MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1146363} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q212989} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q22676} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q161928} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q2383811} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q3300034} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q39546} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q2041172} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q43013} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11422} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11410} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q22937791} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q168658} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q44201312} SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.}} GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

Metadados.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?obra ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?category (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?instancia_qid, '@', ?instancia_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?instancia) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?criador_qid, '@', ?criador_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?criador) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?material_qid, '@', ?material_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?material) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?encomendador_qid, '@', ?encomendador_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?encomendador) (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) (SAMPLE(?audio) AS ?audio) (SAMPLE(?data) AS ?data) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?instancia_ rdfs:label ?instancia_label. ?criador_ rdfs:label ?criador_label. ?obra rdfs:label ?obra_label; schema:description ?obra_descr. ?material_ rdfs:label ?material_label. ?encomendador_ rdfs:label ?encomendador_label. } BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P18 ?imagem_. } BIND(IF(BOUND(?imagem_), REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', ''), 'Calaamad suaal.png') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P989 ?audio_. BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?audio_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?audio)} OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P31 ?instancia_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?instancia_), 32 ) AS ?instancia_qid)} OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P170 ?criador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?criador_), 32 ) AS ?criador_qid)} OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P571 ?data_; (p:P571/psv:P571) ?data_aux. ?data_aux wikibase:timeValue ?data_value; wikibase:timePrecision ?data_precision. BIND(CONCAT(STR(YEAR(?data_value)), '-', STR(MONTH(?data_value)), '-', STR(DAY(?data_value)), '-', STR(?data_precision)) AS ?data)} OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P186 ?material_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?material_), 32 ) AS ?material_qid)} OPTIONAL{?obra wdt:P88 ?encomendador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?encomendador_), 32 ) AS ?encomendador_qid)} OPTIONAL {?category_ schema:about ?obra; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>. BIND(wikibase:decodeUri(SUBSTR(STR(?category_),36)) AS ?category)} } GROUP BY ?obra ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?category

Marcas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?marca_stat_id ?marca_qid ?marca_label ?marca_descr WHERE { BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?item) SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?marca rdfs:label ?marca_label. ?marca schema:description ?marca_descr.} OPTIONAL { {?item p:P1716 ?marca_aux. ?marca_aux ps:P1716 ?marca_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?marca_aux), 42 ) AS ?marca_stat_id) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?marca_), 32 ) AS ?marca_qid) BIND(IF(ISBLANK(?marca_),"marca desconhecida",?marca_) AS ?marca)} UNION {?item p:P1684 ?marca_aux. ?marca_aux ps:P1684 ?marca_label. {?marca_aux pq:P3831 wd:Q431289.} UNION {?marca_aux pq:P3831 wd:Q57305415.} BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?marca_aux), 42 ) AS ?marca_stat_id)}}}

Quantidade_de_obras.query: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT(?item)) AS ?number_works) WHERE { ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem. MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q125191} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q3305213}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q18965}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11034}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q192425}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1572315}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q4006}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q11060274}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q216526}  MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q2668072} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q93184} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q8011558} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q49848} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q23013246} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q488053} MINUS {?item wdt:P31 wd:Q1261026} }
